template.comment: Globally unique identifier for the project.
Globally unique identifier for the tag.
Globally unique identifier for the task.
Globally unique identifier for the user.
Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization.
Globally unique identifier for the attachment.
Globally unique identifier for the team.
Globally unique identifier for the team.
Globally unique identifier for this object.

params.name: task
params.comment: Globally unique identifier for the task.

params.name: text
params.comment: The plain text of the comment to add.

template.comment:
Adds a comment to a task. The comment will be authored by the
currently authenticated user, and timestamped when the server receives
the request.

Returns the full record for the new story added to the task.

name: tag
comment:
A _tag_ is a label that can be attached to any task in Asana. It exists in a
single workspace or organization.

Tags have some metadata associated with them, but it is possible that we will
simplify them in the future so it is not encouraged to rely too heavily on it.
Unlike tags, tags do not provide any ordering on the tasks they
are associated with.

properties.name: id
properties.comment: Globally unique identifier for this object.

actions.name: create

params.name: workspace
params.comment: The workspace or organization to create the tag in.

actions.comment:
Creates a new tag in a workspace or organization.

Every tag is required to be created in a specific workspace or
organization, and this cannot be changed once set. Note that you can use
the `workspace` parameter regardless of whether or not it is an
organization.

Returns the full record of the newly created tag.

actions.name: createInWorkspace

params.name: workspace
params.comment: The workspace or organization to create the tag in.

actions.comment:
Creates a new tag in a workspace or organization.

Every tag is required to be created in a specific workspace or
organization, and this cannot be changed once set. Note that you can use
the `workspace` parameter regardless of whether or not it is an
organization.

Returns the full record of the newly created tag.

actions.name: findById
actions.comment: Returns the complete task record for a single task.

actions.name: update
actions.comment:
Updates the properties of a tag. Only the fields provided in the `data`
block will be updated; any unspecified fields will remain unchanged.

When using this method, it is best to specify only those fields you wish
to change, or else you may overwrite changes made by another user since
you last retrieved the task.

Returns the complete updated tag record.

actions.name: delete
actions.comment:
A specific, existing tag can be deleted by making a DELETE request
on the URL for that tag.

Returns an empty data record.

actions.name: findAll
actions.comment:
Returns the compact tag records for some filtered set of tags.
Use one or more of the parameters provided to filter the tags returned.

params.name: workspace
params.comment: The workspace or organization to filter tags on.

params.name: team
params.comment: The team to filter tags on.

params.name: archived
params.comment:
Only return tags whose `archived` field takes on the value of
this parameter.

actions.name: findByWorkspace

params.name: workspace
params.comment: The workspace or organization to find tags in.

actions.comment: Returns the compact tag records for all tags in the workspace.
